TorchLogix Package
==================

.. currentmodule:: torchlogix

The main TorchLogix package provides the core functionality for differentiable logic gate neural networks.

Main Classes
------------

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/
   :nosignatures:

   CompiledLogicNet
